subject: Football

SAT (College Admission Test)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Cheers were mostly soft and scattered during Harvard’s victory over Yale, as a tragedy during the tailgating turned the festive mood at The Game to one of confusion and then seriousness.
snippet: Cheers were mostly soft and scattered during Harvard’s victory over Yale, as a tragedy during the tailgating turned the festive mood at The Game to one of confusion and then seriousness.
